item.title: Need help lol
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

deathschaos9:

Psst Kozs, you forgot the closing bracket on the fix you gave him 

  case 2357:
  if (c.memberStatus == 1){
  c.sendMessage("You search the bush...");
  c.sendMessage("And find a maul!");
  c.startAnimation(881);
  this.c.getItems().addItem(15039, 1);
  } else {
  c.sendMessage("You search the bush..");
  c.sendMessage("And find nothing... ");
  c.startAnimation(881);

}
break;

item.title: Need help lol
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“Nookumdip, post:1, topic:425088”]Good day mopar

I added so if you are donator and search the bush, you get a maul and if you aren’t a donator it says you dont find anything.
Well, the command works GREAT but if you are a donator and search the bush it says:

You search the bush…
And find a maul!
And find nothing…

This is my code:
case 2357:
if (c.memberStatus == 1){
c.sendMessage(“You search the bush…”);
c.sendMessage(“And find a maul!”);
c.startAnimation(881);
this.c.getItems().addItem(15039, 1);
} else
c.sendMessage(“You search the bush…”);
c.sendMessage(“And find nothing… :(”);
c.startAnimation(881);
break;

Whats wrong with it ?
I’m new to coding…[/quote]

	case 2357:
	if (c.memberStatus == 1){
	c.sendMessage("You search the bush...");
	c.sendMessage("And find a maul!");
	c.startAnimation(881);
	this.c.getItems().addItem(15039, 1);
	} else {
	c.sendMessage("You search the bush..");
	c.sendMessage("And find nothing... :(");
	c.startAnimation(881);
	break;

item.description:
@Nookumdip wrote:

Good day mopar

I added so if you are donator and search the bush, you get a maul and if you aren’t a donator it says you dont find anything.
Well, the command works GREAT but if you are a donator and search the bush it says:

You search the bush…
And find a maul!
And find nothing…

This is my code:
case 2357:
if (c.memberStatus == 1){
c.sendMessage(“You search the bush…”);
c.sendMessage(“And find a maul!”);
c.startAnimation(881);
c.getItems().addItem(15039, 1);
} else
c.sendMessage(“You search the bush…”);
c.sendMessage(“And find nothing… :(”);
c.startAnimation(881);
break;

Whats wrong with it ?
I’m new to coding…
